20101207080843.222|20101207080844.333|CCO|(APPLAUSE)
20101207080844.333|20101207080845.444|CCO|       COPD makes it hard
20101207080845.444|20101207080846.556|CCO|       for me to breathe.
20101207080846.556|20101207080847.667|CCO|        But with ADVAIR,
20101207080847.667|20101207080848.778|CCO|      I'm breathing better.
20101207080848.778|20101207080849.889|CCO| So now, I can join the fun and
20101207080849.889|20101207080851.000|CCO|  games with my grandchildren.
20101207080851.000|20101207080852.667|CCO|           Great news!
20101207080852.667|20101207080854.333|CCO|      For people with COPD,
20101207080854.333|20101207080856.000|CCO|  including chronic bronchitis,
20101207080856.000|20101207080857.667|CCO|       emphysema, or both,
20101207080857.667|20101207080859.333|CCO|   ADVAIR helps significantly
20101207080859.333|20101207080901.000|CCO|     improve lung function.
20101207080901.000|20101207080902.429|CCO| While nothing can reverse COPD,
20101207080902.429|20101207080903.857|CCO|  ADVAIR is different from most
20101207080903.857|20101207080905.286|CCO|     other COPD medications
20101207080905.286|20101207080906.714|CCO|       because it contains
20101207080906.714|20101207080908.143|CCO|    both an anti-inflammatory
20101207080908.143|20101207080909.571|CCO|        and a long-acting
20101207080909.571|20101207080911.000|CCO|         bronchodilator,
20101207080911.000|20101207080912.111|CCO|        working together
20101207080912.111|20101207080913.222|CCO|   to help you breathe better.
20101207080913.222|20101207080914.333|CCO|ADVAIR won't replace fast-acting
20101207080914.333|20101207080915.444|CCO|  inhalers for sudden symptoms
20101207080915.444|20101207080916.556|CCO|        and should not be
20101207080916.556|20101207080917.667|CCO|   used more than twice a day.
20101207080917.667|20101207080918.778|CCO| People with COPD taking ADVAIR
20101207080918.778|20101207080919.889|CCO|    may have a higher chance
20101207080919.889|20101207080921.000|CCO|          of pneumonia.
20101207080921.000|20101207080922.250|CCO|       ADVAIR may increase
20101207080922.250|20101207080923.500|CCO|    your risk of osteoporosis
20101207080923.500|20101207080924.750|CCO|     and some eye problems.
20101207080924.750|20101207080926.000|CCO|        Tell your doctor
20101207080926.000|20101207080927.250|CCO|  if you have a heart condition
20101207080927.250|20101207080928.500|CCO|     or high blood pressure
20101207080928.500|20101207080929.750|CCO|      before taking ADVAIR.
20101207080929.750|20101207080931.000|CCO|    I had fun today, Grandpa.
20101207080931.000|20101207080932.429|CCO|                You and me both.
20101207080932.429|20101207080933.857|CCO|   If COPD is still making it
20101207080933.857|20101207080935.286|CCO|        hard to breathe,
